ResourceHeader.ResourceName: STEREO-B multi-instrument Level 1 IMPACT data from UCB

RevisionEvent.Note: Only known prior ReleaseDate of the metadata
Added PublicationInfo. Added ResourceType and NamingAuthority. ZCB

ResourceHeader.Description: Level 1 data from each of the several IMPACT instruments, in CDF. Time resolutions range from 0.125s (MAG) to 1m (SEPT, LET, HET). Full spectral and directional resolution is preserved in the data. Links are also given on the page to browse plots and to sites with data in ASCII format for some specific instruments.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Principal Investigator Janet Luhmann, and key person(s) for the instrument(s) whose data you are using. (cf. web site)

AccessURL.Name: IMPACT data site at UCB
AccessURL.Description: Path to Level 1 CDF's, to browse plots, to selected ASCII sites, and to various software packages

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Principal Investigator Janet Luhmann, the key person(s) for the instrument(s) whose data you are using (cf. web site), and Peter Schroeder, UCB/IMPACT webmaster

TimeSpan.Note: Exact stop and end dates differ for various instruments' data. Lag time of latest data is typically some months.
